intro.heading: Department of Nursing - Al-Tamakon Comprehensive School for Learning Difficulties
intro.description: Welcome to the Nursing Department, which is considered the beating heart of Tamakon Comprehensive School. We pride ourselves on providing comprehensive health care and support to our students, contributing significantly to enhancing the health and well-being of all members of the school community.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.description: We aim to provide a healthy and safe environment that contributes to enhancing student learning and growth. We work to provide high-quality, specialized medical care that suits the needs of each student.

services.heading: Our Services Include
list: Follow up on students’ health conditions
Providing primary care for minor injuries and illnesses
Providing medications and treatments according to medical prescription
Helping students with special needs manage their health
Cooperating with parents and teachers to provide appropriate health support

comprehensiveCare.heading: Comprehensive Health Care
comprehensiveCare.description: Health care is provided by a dedicated team of professional nurses who work dedicatedly to monitor students’ health and provide the necessary support.

profile.name: Nurse Shaima
profile.role: Dedicated to student care & health support
